ValidationRule.description: Built By BW March 2018 Deployed 6/16 as part of the lightning go-live but feature is determined to be valuable for classic users as well and thus is not restricted to the lightning PDN record type.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(TEXT( PDN_Sample_Requested__c)= "Yes - Ground", OR(ISBlank( Sample_Shipping_Address__c ), ISBlank( Sample_Fedex_Billing_Account__c ) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Sample Shipping Address and Sample Fedex Billing Account are required when choosing Yes as PDN Sample Requested
